title: All mages should be permabanned from OFA
body: We were Vel'Koz they were Morgana. I was like 28/5 by the end but it's SO. BORING. Neither team could push because we did no damage to the turrets. 50 minute game because neither team had any pushing power. Just wave clear. By the end I was dodging around their Qs and shit, winning 3v1 but still tilting like crazy because this shit would never end.
